question: What does SEO stand for?
correctOption: Search Engine Optimization

question: Which of the following is a factor in search engine rankings?
correctOption: All of the above

question: What is a keyword in SEO?
options: A word or phrase that people search for on search engines
A way to measure site traffic
correctOption: A word or phrase that people search for on search engines

question: What is the purpose of meta tags in SEO?
options: To provide metadata about the webpage
To add keywords to the content
To increase the page load speed
To hide the content from users
correctOption: To provide metadata about the webpage

question: Which of the following is a good SEO practice for page titles?
options: Use the same title for all pages
correctOption: Use relevant keywords

question: What is the 'alt text' used for in SEO?
options: Describes the content of an image
Provides a title for a webpage
correctOption: Describes the content of an image

question: What is a backlink in SEO?
options: A link from another website to your website
A link from your website to a social media platform
A link from a page to an image
A link to an external website
correctOption: A link from another website to your website

question: What is the purpose of using heading tags (H1, H2, etc.) in SEO?
options: To organize the content and improve readability
To add images to the page
To make the page load faster
correctOption: To organize the content and improve readability

question: Which of the following is important for improving mobile SEO?
correctOption: All of the above

question: What is the 'robots.txt' file used for in SEO?
options: To tell search engines which pages to crawl or not to crawl
To hide the content of a webpage
correctOption: To tell search engines which pages to crawl or not to crawl

question: What does the term 'long-tail keywords' refer to in SEO?
options: Keywords that are more specific and longer in length
Keywords that are commonly used by everyone
Keywords that are part of a website's title
correctOption: Keywords that are more specific and longer in length

question: Which of the following is a tool used for SEO keyword research?
correctOption: All of the above

question: What is the purpose of a sitemap in SEO?
options: To help search engines find and index pages on a website
To add images to a webpage
To reduce the website's loading time
correctOption: To help search engines find and index pages on a website

question: What is 'local SEO'?
options: Optimizing a website to rank higher for local searches
Optimizing a website for international search engines
Optimizing the content for all languages
correctOption: Optimizing a website to rank higher for local searches

question: What is the purpose of '404 errors' in SEO?
options: To inform the user that a page was not found
correctOption: To inform the user that a page was not found

question: What is 'bounce rate' in SEO?
options: The percentage of visitors who leave the site after viewing only one page
The percentage of visitors who navigate to other pages
The percentage of visitors who interact with pop-up ads
The percentage of visitors who share content on social media
correctOption: The percentage of visitors who leave the site after viewing only one page

question: What is the significance of 'page speed' in SEO?
options: Faster pages provide a better user experience and can improve rankings
Slower pages rank better in search engines
Page speed does not affect SEO
Page speed is only important for mobile devices
correctOption: Faster pages provide a better user experience and can improve rankings

question: What does 'Google Analytics' help you track?
options: Visitor behavior and traffic sources on your website
correctOption: Visitor behavior and traffic sources on your website

question: What is 'content marketing' in SEO?
options: Creating valuable and relevant content to attract and engage visitors
Posting only images on your site
correctOption: Creating valuable and relevant content to attract and engage visitors

question: What is a 'landing page' in SEO?
options: A page designed to convert visitors into customers or leads
A page showing recent blog posts
correctOption: A page designed to convert visitors into customers or leads

question: Which of the following is considered a black-hat SEO technique?
options: Using proper headings and meta descriptions
correctOption: Keyword stuffing

question: What is 'link building' in SEO?
options: The process of acquiring backlinks from other websites
Building internal links within your site
correctOption: The process of acquiring backlinks from other websites

question: What does 'SSL' stand for in SEO?
correctOption: Secure Socket Layer

question: Which of the following is considered a white-hat SEO technique?
correctOption: Creating high-quality, original content

question: What is the purpose of 'schema markup' in SEO?
options: To provide search engines with additional information about a webpage
To add images to a page
correctOption: To provide search engines with additional information about a webpage
